article:
Dear Helen
It's very nice of you to write to me. From your letter, I know a lot about you and your school. Now let me _ you something about _ and my school.
I'm thirteen years old , too. I am in Class One, Grade Seven. My father _ in a big company . My mother is a doctor. _  both  work very hard. Our school is very big. It _ about 2,000 students and 200 teachers. All the teachers are very good, _ all the students study very _ .
Please come and have a look at our school if   you have time.
Best wishes
Daniel
